name: cphlmod

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c0, cnlm))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CPreHil, c0 ∈ LMod, c0 ∈ NrmMod)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clmod))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, cnlm))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clmod))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ NrmMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ LMod)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c0, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c0, clmod))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c0 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c0 ∈ LMod)

comment: A subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is a left module. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
